summary: An armor set made after the League of Legends champion Fiora.
descriptionHtml:
[Img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/3973/fioraarmorbanner.jpg[/img]

In an attempt to mash my favorite games together i have created this humble set of armor modeled after the champion Fiora. it comes in two color sets and styles.
the color sets are one \"vanilla\" color set which i tried to base off of the games default skin. the second is a darker and more crimsion color. 

[center]Location[/center]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg23/scaled.php?server=23&filename=fioralocation.jpg&res=medium[/img]

The barrel containing the armor is behind the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. There are 3 of each and the barrel is set to respawn.

This armor was based off the CBBE Body, but it should be compatible with any of your preffered bodymods

[youtube]PwalplLpFeU[/youtube]
[youtube]94HGOMjU4xk[/youtube]

All assets in this mod are made by myself from scratch

Any Feedback/bug reports/criticism is appreciated.

UPDATE LOG;

3/31/12; uploaded a new ESP which fixes the gauntles to be enchantable, fixes the first person look of the gauntlets. makes all the pieces craftable and improvable.

4/3/12; Uploaded new File with Ground Objects, improvable and craftable items.

4/8/12; New Meshes that remove cameltoe/nipples in armor. new light gauntlets and boots. some first person fixes

Plans for the Future;

More colors/Styles
Weight slider

Supplementary 

Saili\'s retexture

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14439
